content: *beautiful soft blanket and booties for the new little one yarnspirations * materials bernat softee baby 3 balls sizes 3 75 mm u s f or 5 and 4 mm u s g or 6 crochet hooks or size needed to obtain gauge gauge 2 5 reps and 8 row = 4 with larger hook in pattern for blanket 18 double_crochet and 8 row = 4 with smaller hook for booties blanket is worked in row 4-row repeat pattern finished with 3-round edging booties are worked in rounds weave ties through eyelet round to finish
